original: Majjhima Nikāya 52
analyzed: majjhima nikāya

original: Aṭṭhakanāgarasutta
analyzed: aṭṭhaka nāgara sutta

original: Evaṁ me sutaṁ—
analyzed: evam me suta

original: ekaṁ samayaṁ āyasmā ānando vesāliyaṁ viharati beluvagāmake.
analyzed: ekam samayam āyasmai ānandaḥ vesāliyam viharati beluva gāmake

original: Tena kho pana samayena dasamo gahapati aṭṭhakanāgaro pāṭaliputtaṁ anuppatto hoti kenacideva karaṇīyena.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena dasamaḥ gahapati aṭṭhaka nāgaraḥ pāṭaliputtam an uppattaḥ hoti kenacid eva karaṇīyena

original: Atha kho dasamo gahapati aṭṭhakanāgaro yena kukkuṭārāmo yena aññataro bhikkhu tenupasaṅkami;
analyzed: atha kho dasamaḥ gahapati aṭṭhaka nāgaraḥ yena kukkuṭārāmaḥ yena aññataraḥ bhikkhu tena upasaṅkami

original: upasaṅkamitvā taṁ bhikkhuṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho dasamo
analyzed: upasaṅkamitvā tam bhikkhum abhivādetvā ekamantam nisīdi ekamantam nisinnaḥ kho dasamaḥ

original: gahapati aṭṭhakanāgaro taṁ bhikkhuṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: gahapati aṭṭhaka nāgaraḥ tam bhikkhum etat avoca

original: “kahaṁ nu kho, bhante, āyasmā ānando etarahi viharati?
analyzed: kaham nu kho bhante āyasmai ānandaḥ etarahi viharati

original: Dassanakāmā hi mayaṁ taṁ āyasmantaṁ ānandan”ti.
analyzed: dassana kāmāḥ hi mayam tam āyasmantam ānandanti

original: “Eso, gahapati, āyasmā ānando vesāliyaṁ viharati beluvagāmake”ti.
analyzed: esaḥ gahapati āyasmai ānandaḥ vesāliyam viharati beluva gāmaka iti

original: Atha kho dasamo gahapati aṭṭhakanāgaro pāṭaliputte taṁ karaṇīyaṁ tīretvā yena vesālī
analyzed: atha kho dasamaḥ gahapati aṭṭhaka nāgaraḥ pāṭaliputte tam karaṇīyam tīretvā yena vesālī

original: yena beluvagāmako yenāyasmā ānando tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ
analyzed: yena beluva gāmakaḥ yena āyasmai ānando tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantam ānanda

original: abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho dasamo gahapati aṭṭhakanāgaro
analyzed: abhivādetvā ekamantam nisīdi ekamantam nisinnaḥ kho dasamaḥ gahapati aṭṭhaka nāgaro

original: āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: āyasmantam ānandam etat avoca

original: “atthi nu kho, bhante ānanda, tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena
analyzed: atthi nu kho bhante ānanda tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena

original: ekadhammo akkhāto yattha bhikkhuno appamattassa ātāpino pahitattassa viharato avimuttañceva
analyzed: eka dhammaḥ akkhātaḥ yattha bhikkhuno appamattassa ātāpino pahitattassa viharataḥ avimuttam ca eva

original: cittaṁ vimuccati, aparikkhīṇā ca āsavā parikkhayaṁ gacchanti, ananuppattañca anuttaraṁ
analyzed: cittam vimuccati a parikkhīṇā ca āsavā parikkhayam gacchanti an anuppattam ca anuttara

original: yogakkhemaṁ anupāpuṇātī”ti?
analyzed: yogakkhemam anupāpuṇāti iti

original: “Atthi kho, gahapati, tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena ekadhammo
analyzed: atthi kho gahapati tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena eka dhammaḥ

original: akkhāto, yattha bhikkhuno appamattassa ātāpino pahitattassa viharato avimuttañceva
analyzed: akkhātaḥ yattha bhikkhuno appamattassa ātāpino pahitattassa viharataḥ a vimuttam ca iva

original: cittaṁ vimuccati, aparikkhīṇā ca āsavā parikkhayaṁ gacchanti, ananuppattañca anuttaraṁ
analyzed: cittam vimuccati a parikkhīṇā ca āsavā parikkhayam gacchanti an anuppattam ca anuttara

original: yogakkhemaṁ anupāpuṇātī”ti.
analyzed: yogakkhemam anupāpuṇāti iti

original: “Katamo pana, bhante ānanda, tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena
analyzed: katamaḥ pana bhante ānanda tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena

original: ekadhammo akkhāto, yattha bhikkhuno appamattassa ātāpino pahitattassa viharato avimuttañceva
analyzed: eka dhammaḥ akkhātaḥ yattha bhikkhuno appamattassa ātāpino pahitattassa viharataḥ avimuttam ca eva

original: cittaṁ vimuccati, aparikkhīṇā ca āsavā parikkhayaṁ gacchanti, ananuppattañca anuttaraṁ
analyzed: cittam vimuccati a parikkhīṇā ca āsavā parikkhayam gacchanti an anuppattam ca anuttara

original: yogakkhemaṁ anupāpuṇātī”ti?
analyzed: yogakkhemam anupāpuṇāti iti

original: “Idha, gahapati, bhikkhu vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkaṁ savicāraṁ vivekajaṁ pītisukhaṁ paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati.
analyzed: idha gahapati bhikkhu vivicca iva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi sa vitakkam sa vicāram viveka jam pīti sukham paṭhamam jhānam upasampajja viharati

original: So iti paṭisañcikkhati:
analyzed: saḥ iti paṭisañcikkhati

original: ‘idampi kho paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ abhisaṅkhataṁ abhisañcetayitaṁ.
analyzed: idam api kho paṭhamam jhānam

original: Yaṁ kho pana kiñci abhisaṅkhataṁ abhisañcetayitaṁ tadaniccaṁ nirodhadhamman’ti pajānāti.
analyzed: yam kho pana kiñci abhisaṅkhatam abhisañcetayitam tat aniccam nirodha dhammanti pajānāti

original: So tattha ṭhito āsavānaṁ khayaṁ pāpuṇāti.
analyzed: saḥ tattha ṭhitaḥ āsavānam khayam pāpuṇāti

original: No ce āsavānaṁ khayaṁ pāpuṇāti, teneva dhammarāgena tāya dhammanandiyā pañcannaṁ orambhāgiyānaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ parikkhayā opapātiko hoti tattha parinibbāyī anāvattidhammo tasmā lokā.
analyzed: no ce āsavānam khayam pāpuṇāti tena iva dhamma rāgena tāya dhamma nandiyā pañcannam orambhāgiyānam sayojanānam parikkhayā opapātikaḥ hoti tattha parinibbāyī an āvatti dhammo tasmā lokā

original: Ayampi kho, gahapati, tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena ekadhammo
analyzed: ayam pi kho gahapati tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena eka dhammaḥ

original: akkhāto, yattha bhikkhuno appamattassa ātāpino pahitattassa viharato avimuttañceva
analyzed: akkhātaḥ yattha bhikkhuno appamattassa ātāpino pahitattassa viharataḥ a vimuttam ca iva

original: cittaṁ vimuccati, aparikkhīṇā ca āsavā parikkhayaṁ gacchanti, ananuppattañca anuttaraṁ
analyzed: cittam vimuccati a parikkhīṇā ca āsavā parikkhayam gacchanti an anuppattam ca anuttara

original: yogakkhemaṁ anupāpuṇāti.
analyzed: yogakkhemam anupāpuṇāti

original: Puna caparaṁ, gahapati, bhikkhu vitakkavicārānaṁ vūpasamā ajjhattaṁ sampasādanaṁ …pe… dutiyaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati.
analyzed: puna capara gahapati bhikkhu vitakka vicārānam vūpasamā ajjhattam sampasādanam pe dutiyam jhānam upasampajja viharati

original: So iti paṭisañcikkhati:
analyzed: saḥ iti paṭisañcikkhati

original: ‘idampi kho dutiyaṁ jhānaṁ abhisaṅkhataṁ abhisañcetayitaṁ …pe…
analyzed: idam api kho dutiyam jhānam abhisaṅkhatam abhisañcetayitam pe

original: anuttaraṁ yogakkhemaṁ anupāpuṇāti.
analyzed: anuttaram yogakkhemam anupāpuṇāti

original: Puna caparaṁ, gahapati, bhikkhu pītiyā ca virāgā …pe… tatiyaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati.
analyzed: puna capara gahapati bhikkhu pītiyā ca virāgā pe tatiyam jhānam upasampajja viharati

original: So iti paṭisañcikkhati:
analyzed: saḥ iti paṭisañcikkhati

original: ‘idampi kho tatiyaṁ jhānaṁ abhisaṅkhataṁ abhisañcetayitaṁ …pe…
analyzed: idam api kho tatiyam jhānam abhisaṅkhatam abhisañcetayitam pe

original: anuttaraṁ yogakkhemaṁ anupāpuṇāti.
analyzed: anuttaram yogakkhemam anupāpuṇāti

original: Puna caparaṁ, gahapati, bhikkhu sukhassa ca pahānā …pe… catutthaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati.
analyzed: puna capara gahapati bhikkhu sukhassa ca pahānā pe catuttham jhānam upasampajja viharati

original: So iti paṭisañcikkhati:
analyzed: saḥ iti paṭisañcikkhati

original: ‘idampi kho catutthaṁ jhānaṁ abhisaṅkhataṁ abhisañcetayitaṁ …pe…
analyzed: idam api kho catuttham jhānam abhisaṅkhatam abhisañcetayitam pe

original: anuttaraṁ yogakkhemaṁ anupāpuṇāti.
analyzed: anuttaram yogakkhemam anupāpuṇāti

original: Puna caparaṁ, gahapati, bhikkhu mettāsahagatena cetasā ekaṁ disaṁ pharitvā viharati,
analyzed: puna capara gahapati bhikkhu mettā sahagatena cetasā ekam disam pharitvā viharati

original: tathā dutiyaṁ, tathā tatiyaṁ, tathā catutthaṁ. Iti uddhamadho tiriyaṁ sabbadhi sabbattatāya
analyzed: tathā dutiya tathā tatiya tathā catuttha iti uddham adhas tiriyam sabbadhi sabbattatāya

original: sabbāvantaṁ lokaṁ mettāsahagatena cetasā vipulena mahaggatena appamāṇena averena
analyzed: sabbāvantam lokam mettā sahagatena cetasā vipulena mahaggatena appamāṇena averena

original: abyābajjhena pharitvā viharati.
analyzed: a byābajjhena pharitvā viharati

original: So iti paṭisañcikkhati:
analyzed: saḥ iti paṭisañcikkhati

original: ‘ayampi kho mettācetovimutti abhisaṅkhatā abhisañcetayitā.
analyzed: ayam pi kho mettā cetaḥ vimutti abhisaṅkhatā abhisañcetayitā

original: Yaṁ kho pana kiñci abhisaṅkhataṁ abhisañcetayitaṁ tadaniccaṁ nirodhadhamman’ti pajānāti.
analyzed: yam kho pana kiñci abhisaṅkhatam abhisañcetayitam tat aniccam nirodha dhammanti pajānāti

original: So tattha ṭhito …pe…
analyzed: saḥ tattha ṭhitaḥ pe

original: anuttaraṁ yogakkhemaṁ anupāpuṇāti.
analyzed: anuttaram yogakkhemam anupāpuṇāti

original: Puna caparaṁ, gahapati, bhikkhu karuṇāsahagatena cetasā …pe…
analyzed: puna capara gahapati bhikkhu karuṇā sahagatena cetasā pe

original: muditāsahagatena cetasā …pe…
analyzed: muditā sahagatena cetasā pe

original: upekkhāsahagatena cetasā ekaṁ disaṁ pharitvā viharati, tathā dutiyaṁ, tathā tatiyaṁ,
analyzed: upekkhā sahagatena cetasā ekam disam pharitvā viharati tathā dutiya tathā tatiya

original: tathā catutthaṁ. Iti uddhamadho tiriyaṁ sabbadhi sabbattatāya sabbāvantaṁ lokaṁ upekkhāsahagatena
analyzed: tathā catutthaḥ iti uddham adhas tiriyam sabbadhi sabbattatāya sabbāvantam lokam upekkhā sahagatena

original: cetasā vipulena mahaggatena appamāṇena averena abyābajjhena pharitvā viharati.
analyzed: cetasā vipulena mahaggatena appamāṇena averena abyābajjhena pharitvā viharati

original: So iti paṭisañcikkhati:
analyzed: saḥ iti paṭisañcikkhati

original: ‘ayampi kho upekkhācetovimutti abhisaṅkhatā abhisañcetayitā.
analyzed: ayam pi kho upekkhā cetaḥ vimutti abhisaṅkhatā abhisañcetayitā

original: Yaṁ kho pana kiñci abhisaṅkhataṁ abhisañcetayitaṁ tadaniccaṁ nirodhadhamman’ti pajānāti.
analyzed: yam kho pana kiñci abhisaṅkhatam abhisañcetayitam tat aniccam nirodha dhammanti pajānāti

original: So tattha ṭhito …pe…
analyzed: saḥ tattha ṭhitaḥ pe

original: anuttaraṁ yogakkhemaṁ anupāpuṇāti.
analyzed: anuttaram yogakkhemam anupāpuṇāti

original: Puna caparaṁ, gahapati, bhikkhu sabbaso rūpasaññānaṁ samatikkamā paṭighasaññānaṁ atthaṅgamā nānattasaññānaṁ amanasikārā ‘ananto ākāso’ti ākāsānañcāyatanaṁ upasampajja viharati.
analyzed: puna capara gahapati bhikkhu sabbaso rūpa saññānam samatikkamā paṭigha saññānam atthaṅgamā nānatta saññānam amanasikārā anantaḥ ākāsaḥ ti ākāsānañcāyatanam upasampajja viharati

original: So iti paṭisañcikkhati:
analyzed: saḥ iti paṭisañcikkhati

original: ‘ayampi kho ākāsānañcāyatanasamāpatti abhisaṅkhatā abhisañcetayitā.
analyzed: ayam pi kho ākāsa anañcāyatana samāpatti abhisaṅkhatā abhisañcetayitā

original: Yaṁ kho pana kiñci abhisaṅkhataṁ abhisañcetayitaṁ tadaniccaṁ nirodhadhamman’ti pajānāti.
analyzed: yam kho pana kiñci abhisaṅkhatam abhisañcetayitam tat aniccam nirodha dhammanti pajānāti

original: So tattha ṭhito …pe…
analyzed: saḥ tattha ṭhitaḥ pe

original: anuttaraṁ yogakkhemaṁ anupāpuṇāti.
analyzed: anuttaram yogakkhemam anupāpuṇāti

original: Puna caparaṁ, gahapati, bhikkhu sabbaso ākāsānañcāyatanaṁ samatikkamma ‘anantaṁ viññāṇan’ti viññāṇañcāyatanaṁ upasampajja viharati.
analyzed: puna capara gahapati bhikkhu sabbaso ākāsānañcāyatanam samatikkamma anantam viññāṇanti viññāṇañcāyatanam upasampajja viharati

original: So iti paṭisañcikkhati:
analyzed: saḥ iti paṭisañcikkhati

original: ‘ayampi kho viññāṇañcāyatanasamāpatti abhisaṅkhatā abhisañcetayitā.
analyzed: ayam pi kho viññāṇañcāyatana samāpatti abhisaṅkhatā abhisañcetayitā

original: Yaṁ kho pana kiñci abhisaṅkhataṁ abhisañcetayitaṁ tadaniccaṁ nirodhadhamman’ti pajānāti.
analyzed: yam kho pana kiñci abhisaṅkhatam abhisañcetayitam tat aniccam nirodha dhammanti pajānāti

original: So tattha ṭhito …pe…
analyzed: saḥ tattha ṭhitaḥ pe

original: anuttaraṁ yogakkhemaṁ anupāpuṇāti.
analyzed: anuttaram yogakkhemam anupāpuṇāti

original: Puna caparaṁ, gahapati, bhikkhu sabbaso viññāṇañcāyatanaṁ samatikkamma ‘natthi kiñcī’ti ākiñcaññāyatanaṁ upasampajja viharati.
analyzed: puna capara gahapati bhikkhu sabbasas viññāṇañca āyatanam samatikkamma na atthi kiñci iti ākiñcaññāyatanam upasampajja viharati

original: So iti paṭisañcikkhati:
analyzed: saḥ iti paṭisañcikkhati

original: ‘ayampi kho ākiñcaññāyatanasamāpatti abhisaṅkhatā abhisañcetayitā.
analyzed: ayam pi kho ākiñcaññāyatana samāpatti abhisaṅkhatā abhisañcetayitā

original: Yaṁ kho pana kiñci abhisaṅkhataṁ abhisañcetayitaṁ tadaniccaṁ nirodhadhamman’ti pajānāti.
analyzed: yam kho pana kiñci abhisaṅkhatam abhisañcetayitam tat aniccam nirodha dhammanti pajānāti

original: So tattha ṭhito āsavānaṁ khayaṁ pāpuṇāti.
analyzed: saḥ tattha ṭhitaḥ āsavānam khayam pāpuṇāti

original: No ce āsavānaṁ khayaṁ pāpuṇāti, teneva dhammarāgena tāya dhammanandiyā pañcannaṁ orambhāgiyānaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ parikkhayā opapātiko hoti tattha parinibbāyī anāvattidhammo tasmā lokā.
analyzed: no ce āsavānam khayam pāpuṇāti tena iva dhamma rāgena tāya dhamma nandiyā pañcannam orambhāgiyānam sayojanānam parikkhayā opapātikaḥ hoti tattha parinibbāyī an āvatti dhammo tasmā lokā

original: Ayampi kho, gahapati, tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena ekadhammo
analyzed: ayam pi kho gahapati tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena eka dhammaḥ

original: akkhāto yattha bhikkhuno appamattassa ātāpino pahitattassa viharato avimuttañceva
analyzed: akkhātaḥ yattha bhikkhuno appamattassa ātāpino pahitattassa viharataḥ a vimuttam ca iva

original: cittaṁ vimuccati, aparikkhīṇā ca āsavā parikkhayaṁ gacchanti, ananuppattañca anuttaraṁ
analyzed: cittam vimuccati a parikkhīṇā ca āsavā parikkhayam gacchanti an anuppattam ca anuttara

original: yogakkhemaṁ anupāpuṇātī”ti.
analyzed: yogakkhemam anupāpuṇāti iti

original: Evaṁ vutte, dasamo gahapati aṭṭhakanāgaro āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: evam vutte dasamaḥ gahapati aṭṭhaka nāgaraḥ āyasmantam ānandam etat avoca

original: “seyyathāpi, bhante ānanda, puriso ekaṁva nidhimukhaṁ gavesanto sakideva ekādasa nidhimukhāni adhigaccheyya;
analyzed: sa iyyathā api bhante ānanda purisaḥ nidhi mukham gavesantaḥ sakidevaḥ ekādasa nidhi mukhāni adhigaccheyya

original: evameva kho ahaṁ, bhante, ekaṁ amatadvāraṁ gavesanto sakideva ekādasa amatadvārāni alatthaṁ bhāvanāya.
analyzed: evam eva kho aha bhante ekam amata dvāram gavesantaḥ sakidevaḥ ekādasa amata dvārāni alattham bhāvanāya

original: Seyyathāpi, bhante, purisassa agāraṁ ekādasadvāraṁ, so tasmiṁ agāre āditte ekamekenapi dvārena sakkuṇeyya attānaṁ sotthiṁ kātuṁ;
analyzed: seyyathā api bhante purisassa agāram ekādasa dvāra saḥ tasmin agāre āditte ekam ekena api dvārena sakkuṇeyya attānam sotthim kātu

original: evameva kho ahaṁ, bhante, imesaṁ ekādasannaṁ amatadvārānaṁ ekamekenapi amatadvārena sakkuṇissāmi attānaṁ sotthiṁ kātuṁ.
analyzed: evam eva kho aha bhante imesam ekādasannam amatadvārānam ekam ekena api amatadvārena sakkuṇissāmi attānam sotthim kātu

original: Imehi nāma, bhante, aññatitthiyā ācariyassa ācariyadhanaṁ pariyesissanti, kimaṅgaṁ panāhaṁ āyasmato ānandassa pūjaṁ na karissāmī”ti.
analyzed: imehi nāma bhante añña titthiyāḥ ācariyassa ācariya dhanam pariyesissanti kimaṅgam pana aham āyasmataḥ ānandassa pūjam na karissāmi iti

original: Atha kho dasamo gahapati aṭṭhakanāgaro pāṭaliputtakañca vesālikañca bhikkhusaṅghaṁ sannipātetvā paṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena sahatthā santappesi sampavāresi,
analyzed: atha kho dasamaḥ gahapati aṭṭhaka nāgaraḥ pāṭaliputtakam ca vesālikam ca bhikkhu saṅgham sannipātetvā paṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena sahatthā santappesi sampavāresi

original: ekamekañca bhikkhuṁ paccekaṁ dussayugena acchādesi, āyasmantañca ānandaṁ ticīvarena acchādesi, āyasmato ca ānandassa pañcasatavihāraṁ kārāpesīti.
analyzed: ekam ekam ca bhikkhum paccekam dussa yugena acchādesi āyasmantam ca ānandam ti cīvarena acchādesi āyasmataḥ ca ānandassa pañca sata vihāram kārāpesi iti

original: Aṭṭhakanāgarasuttaṁ niṭṭhitaṁ dutiyaṁ.
analyzed: aṭṭhaka nāgara suttam niṭṭhitam dutiya
